text:
ISBN-13: 9780553381412.
ISBN-10: 0553381415.
Title: Men Who Hate Women and the Women Who Love Them.
Subtitle: When Loving Hurts and You Don't Know Why.
Authors: Susan Forward;Joan Torres.
Categories: Family & Relationships.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=bCJ_PBO1A68C&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Profiles of men who emotionally abuse women and the women who are attracted to them are accompanied by advice for women who want to improve or terminate misogynistic relationships while increasing their self-respect, courage, and confidence. Reprint..
Published Year: 2002.
